There is a lot of missing information about their past relationship guys so you shouldn't judge her so easily.
For instance in Japan I kinda get the notion that men are expected to take the initiative so it's possible that she kept waiting for him to make his move but he never did anything and then he broke up with her. This might have traumatized her and then in her next relationships she felt that if she didn't give herself to the guy then she would be dumped. Now after failing at finding someone nice she probably did introspection about the only relationship where she felt comfortable and probably realized that it's not that he didn't like her but that he was shy so it's not like she needs to be sexually proactive just with anyone but that depends on the person.
